title: RIDGEBOT - data connector for Azure Sentinel
descriptionMarkdown: The RidgeBot connector lets users connect RidgeBot with Microsoft Sentinel, allowing creation of Dashboards, Workbooks, Notebooks and Alerts.

sampleQueries.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "RidgeSecurity"
| where DeviceEventClassID == "4001"
 | order by TimeGenerated desc 
| limit 10

dataTypes.name: CommonSecurityLog
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "RidgeSecurity"
| summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
| where isnotempty(Time)

value:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "RidgeSecurity"
| summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
| project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)
